comments: Not multiplicative: a(3)*a(7) != a(21), for example. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 20 2011
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} (4*n+1)*x^(4*n+1)/(1-x^(4*n+1)). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 14 2002a(n) = A000593(n) - A050452(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 18 2006
maple: A050449 := proc(n)        a := 0 ;        for d in numtheory[divisors](n) do                if d mod 4 = 1 then                        a := a+d ;                end if;        end do:        a;end proc:seq(A050449(n),n=1..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 20 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 1999
